# Wildfire visualization

## Evaluate and visualize
 - [Sentinel Playground](http://apps.sentinel-hub.com/sentinel-playground/?source=S2&lat=43.514198796857976&lng=16.601028442382812&zoom=11&preset=CUSTOM&layers=B04,B03,B02&maxcc=20&gain=1&gamma=1&time=2015-01-01%7C2017-07-17&atmFilter=&showDates=false&%2FIChBKEIxMiwgQjExKSA%2BICgyLjAgLyBTRU5TSVRJVklUWSkpID8gRklSRTIgOiBGSVJFMQo6IE5PRklSRTsK)
 - [EO Browser](http://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser/#lat=43.50174856516506&lng=16.510391235351562&zoom=11&datasource=Sentinel-2%20L1C&time=2017-07-17&preset=CUSTOM&layers=B01,B02,B03&%2FIChBKEIxMiwgQjExKSA%2BICgyLjAgLyBTRU5TSVRJVklUWSkpID8gRklSRTIgOiBGSVJFMQo6IE5PRklSRTsK%3D)

## Basic information
 - Bands used by the algorithm: B11, B12
 - Bands used by the script: B2, B3, B4, B5, B8, B11, B12

## General description
The script visualizes wildfires from Sentinel-2 data. It was published by Pierre Markuse on his blog post [1] in August 2017.

## References
[1] P. Markuse, [Visualizing (Wild)Fires in Sentinel-2 imagery through EO Browser
](https://pierre-markuse.net/2017/08/07/visualizing-wildfires-sentinel-2-imagery-eo-browser/). August 2017.
